## BoilerplateIntegrationContext type

Runtime integration context, which includes API client instance, settings, and endpoints that will be passed via middleware server. This interface name is starting with `Boilerplate`<!-- -->, but you should use your integration name in here.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type BoilerplateIntegrationContext = IntegrationContext<AxiosInstance, MiddlewareConfig, ContextualizedEndpoints>;
```
<b>References:</b> [MiddlewareConfig](./integration-boilerplate-api.middlewareconfig.md)<!-- -->, [ContextualizedEndpoints](./integration-boilerplate-api.contextualizedendpoints.md)
